Header.title: NO PROJECT IS TOO LARGE OR TOO SMALL

About.paragraph: GrayC Electric is a family-owned electrical contracting firm rooted in Colorado Springs, CO. Established in 2014 by Jack Hollesen and Luke Hanson, GrayC Electric has flourished into a company boasting over 35 dedicated employees and an annual sales revenue exceeding $4.5 million. At GrayC Electric, our foundation lies in prioritizing unparalleled customer service and fostering strong client relationships. Setting ourselves apart from competitors, we consistently exceed expectations by delivering exceptional service and going the extra mile for all our customers. Our team comprises motivated individuals who benefit from robust team management, all geared toward the primary objective of completing every project on schedule, within budget, and showcasing unmistakable quality in our work.
Why: Systems Electric, Inc. was founded on the idea that customer service and the relationships with those customers are the utmost priority.
Tailored Solutions: We provide customized electrical solutions for your needs, ensuring efficiency and sustainability.
Why2: Experienced Team: Our seasoned team brings expertise and a proven track record of successful projects.
Safety First: We prioritize safety with rigorous protocols, creating a secure working environment.
Clear Communication: Experience open and transparent communication throughout your project journey.

Gallery.title: Affordable Dentures - Lakewood, Ft. Collins, and Aurora

Services.name: Comprehensive Design Services
Services.text: From conceptualization to completion, we specialize in pre-construction budgeting/design and design/build new construction, employing leading engineers for quality assurance.

Services.name: Efficiency in Project Management
Services.text: We excel in adhering to budget and time constraints by leveraging our extensive knowledge, ensuring the latest technology implementation for optimal efficiency.

Services.name: Bid Submission Expertise
Services.text: Utilizing cutting-edge software, we provide competitive bids tailored to your project needs and offer value engineering solutions, optimizing your budget without compromising quality.

Services.name: Energy Studies and Compliance
Services.text: Our energy and load demand studies, aligned with NEC Article 220.87, use the latest metering equipment, enabling precise determination of existing loads for engineering purposes.

Services.name: Commercial and Light Industrial Services
Services.text: From pre-construction design to maintenance contracts, we cover a wide spectrum including ground-up construction, lighting retrofits, security systems, and more.

Services.name: Residential Expertise
Services.text: Catering to custom homes, remodels, electrical upgrades, and troubleshooting, we handle projects of any size, providing quality service and attention to detail.

Testimonials.text: "It was to our incredible fortune that we connected with Jack Hollesen, owner of GrayC Electric, via a recommendation of a friend that I trust implicitly. We knew from the moment we met Jack that we had been graced with a gift. This man and his know~how, combined with his integrity, provided us with a solution for our electric vehicle charging, together with a complete garage wiring upgrade. All completed at a cost that we know was generous to us. The final outcome is unsurpassed and beautiful. We've never seen anything like the actual products he used. They were just beautiful and done with absolute focus and care. We know that GrayC Electric is focused primarily on commercial buildings, but my hope is that Jack will expand his vast knowledge and skills to assist the residential demographic that we know will flock to his integrity and wisdom (he is literally a Master Electrician by every facet conceivable). Thank YOU Jack for Being You.
Testimonials.name: Carmel and Andrew
